expo.name: Board Game Scoreboard
expo.description: Simple scoreboard for tracking two players during board games and card games. Easy-to-use plus and minus buttons to keep score.

storeListing.shortDescription: Track scores for two players during board games
storeListing.fullDescription:
Board Game Scoreboard is a simple and intuitive score tracker for two-player board games and card games. Keep track of points with large, easy-to-tap plus and minus buttons.

Features:
• Two-player score tracking
• Large, easy-to-use buttons
• Reset scores instantly
• Clean, distraction-free interface
• No ads or tracking
• Works completely offline
• Free forever

Privacy: This app does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. All scores are stored locally on your device.
